transcript:
(bright music) (upbeat music) ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ Make sure they are safe ♪ ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ So they can run and play ♪ ♪ We give them water ♪ ♪ And food to eat ♪ - Yeah! ♪ Yes, please ♪ ♪ And give 'em a cozy ♪ ♪ Place to sleep ♪ ♪ Animals love playing ♪ ♪ And running all around ♪ - Tag, you're it. ♪ They love to spin and dance ♪ ♪ And jump up and down ♪ ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ Make sure they are safe ♪ ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ So they can run and play ♪ ♪ It's important to look out ♪ ♪ For our furry friends ♪ ♪ Our furry friends ♪ ♪ They need our help ♪ ♪ To take care of them ♪ ♪ When they get messy ♪ ♪ We clean them up ♪
♪ Clean them up ♪ ♪ And every day ♪ ♪ We show our love ♪ ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ Make sure they are safe ♪ ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ So they can run and play ♪ ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ Make sure they are safe ♪ ♪ Let's take care of animals ♪ ♪ So they can run and play ♪ (all laughing) (sheep bleating) - Baa, oh, baa!
